description:
Hiyori and Kanami are finally introduced to FineMan the Mokusa organization after escaping on a Mokusa submarine. Meanwhile, in Renpu, Yukina tries to force Sayaka to be injected with aradama, but Sayaka suddenly refuses and runs away. Mai comes to Sayaka`s rescue but the girls are pursued and attacked by Yume and find themselves escaping into Mokusa`s protection.
Source: crunchyroll
